data.message: Hi man! Please release that album faster man, my friends forgot about you, about your crazy rap, not afraid, mockingbird and the others, please, release the best song you'll ever do, i want you back on TV, you are my favorite rapper of all time, please, i dont want them to laugh when i say your name, thay are saying you are old, expired, etc, please, i love you, Em, hope you see this message and come out with a beast, love you.
